tags.name: qt-config-provider
tags.description: Config Provider is used for providing global configurations, which enables your entire application to access these configurations everywhere.

props.name: button
props.description: button related configuration, [see the following table](#button-attribute)

props.name: experimental-features
props.description: features at experimental stage to be added, all features are default to be set to false

props.name: plain
props.description: determine whether it's a plain button

props.name: text
props.description: determine whether it's a text button

props.name: bg
props.description: determine whether the text button background color is always on

props.name: link
props.description: determine whether it's a link button

props.name: round
props.description: determine whether it's a round button

props.name: circle
props.description: determine whether it's a circle button

props.name: auto-insert-space
props.description: automatically insert a space between two chinese characters

props.name: color
props.description: custom button color, automatically calculate `hover` and `active` color

props.name: dark
props.description: dark mode, which automatically converts `color` to dark mode colors

attributes.description: determine whether it's a plain button

attributes.name: auto-insert-space
attributes.description: automatically insert a space between two chinese characters

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: custom button color, automatically calculate `hover` and `active` color

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: dark mode, which automatically converts `color` to dark mode colors
